channel.title: Python on MOK's Onomatomaniske Kaos
channel.description: Recent content in Python on MOK's Onomatomaniske Kaos

item.title: Installing Python 3 compatible Fabric
item.description: Unfortunately, Fabric has not yet officilly been ported to Python 3. However, it is possible to get it to work. Here is how I did it. First, create a virtual environment to run fabric in. (If you haven’t set up virtual environments for Python, go ahead and do that now, then come back.) I have the [fink environment] (http://finkproject.org) installed on my Mac, and the Python 3 executable is in /sw/bin/python3.
